title: Modeling!
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Hanayo-chan’s curves are so soft and gentle. The way she ever so slightly glances at me makes me want to protect her....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>S-, stop it~! What are you saying, Riko-san!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ah, sorry, did I say that out loud?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yes, very clearly!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, I’m sorry. My mind always slips out when I’m drawing. But I’m only stating the truth, you know? I really think–<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Even so, it’s still embarrassing~! No matter how you look at me, I’m just a plain, ordinary girl. I don’t even know why I’m modeling for you right now....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Hmm.... You might see yourself that way, but I still think you look adorable.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>....Really? Do you really mean that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ah, don’t move yet, Hanayo-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ueeeeh, you’re a totally different person when you’re drawing, Riko-san~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
